# lineBreakStrategy

**Instance Property**

The strategies that the text system may use to break lines while laying out the paragraph.

## Declaration

```swift
var lineBreakStrategy: NSParagraphStyle.LineBreakStrategy { get set }
```

## Discussion

Line-break strategies are collections of options the system uses to determine where to break lines in a paragraph. This is different from [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSParagraphStyle/lineBreakMode], which controls how to lay out lines of text that don’t fit in a container. The system ignores this property if the paragraph style’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSParagraphStyle/lineBreakMode] property specifies a mode that doesn’t support multiple lines, such as [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSLineBreakMode/byClipping].

The default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSLineBreakStrategy/NSLineBreakStrategyNone].

## Setting line-break information

- **lineBreakMode**: The mode for breaking lines in the paragraph.
- **hyphenationFactor**: The paragraph’s threshold for hyphenation.
- **usesDefaultHyphenation**
- **tighteningFactorForTruncation**: The threshold for using tightening as an alternative to truncation.
- **allowsDefaultTighteningForTruncation**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system tightens intercharacter spacing before truncating text.
